text_result.title: MedlinePlus 			Medical Encyclopedia <span class="mak_1">Diabeti</span>c ketoacidosis
text_result.fulltxt:
<ul>
 <li><strong>. . . </strong>     			 			 				 Return to top Diabetic ketoacidosis is a complication of diabetes that occurs when sugar glucose is not available as a fuel source by the body and fat is used instead Byproducts of fat breakdown called ketones build up i<strong>  . . .</strong></li>
 <li><strong>. . . </strong> build up in the body Causes     			 			 				 Return to top People with Type I diabetes lack enough insulin a hormone the body uses to process sugar glucose for energy When glucose is not available body fat is broken down instead The by<strong>. . . </strong></li>
 <li><strong>. . . </strong> glucose without insulin Diabetic ketoacidosis may lead to a diagnosis of type 1 diabetes because it is often the first symptom that causes a person to see a doctor It can also be the result of increased insulin needs in someone already<strong>. . . </strong></li>
 </ul>

text_result.title: MedlinePlus 			Medical Encyclopedia <span class="mak_1">Diabeti</span>c nephropathy
text_result.fulltxt:
<ul>
 <li><strong>. . . </strong> Diabetic nephropathy is kidney disease or damage that results as a complication of diabetes See also Type 1 diabetes Type 2 diabetes Risk factors for diabetes Causes     			 			 				 Return to top The exact cause of diabetic nephropathy is unknown <strong>  . . .</strong></li>
 <li><strong>. . . </strong> some cases your genes or family history may also play a role Not all persons with diabetes develop this condition Each kidney is made of hundreds of thousands of filtering units called nephrons Each nephron has a cluster of tiny blood vessels<strong>. . . </strong></li>
 <li><strong>. . . </strong> begin to leak and protein albumin begins to pass into the urine Persons with diabetes who have the following risk factors are more likely to develop this condition African American Hispanic or American Indian origin Family history of kidney<strong>. . . </strong></li>
 </ul>
